STMRP¶

Module for MRP-based spatio-temporal interpolation.

class MRPinterpolation.STMRP.SD_STMRP(grid, auto_timestamps=False, gamma=0.9, tau=0.9)¶

Bases: MRPinterpolation.STMRP.STMRP

Class for SD-STMRP, extending STMRP

original_grid2D numpy array

the original grid supplied to be interpolated

pred_grid2D numpy array

interpolated version of original_grid

Gnetworkx directed graph

graph representation of pred_grid

gammafloat

spatial discount parameter gamma used by SD-STMRP (typically 0-1

taufloat

temporal discount parameter tau used by SD-STMRP (typically 0-1)

run():

Runs SD-MRP

set_gamma():

Sets gamma to a user-specified value

set_tau():

Sets tau to a user-specified value

find_gamma():

Automatically determines the best gamma (using subsampling or a training set)

find_discounts(search_epochs, subsample_proportion, iterations=100, ext=None)¶

Automatically sets gamma and tau to the best found value. Currently only supports random search.

Parameters

  • search_epochs – number of epochs used by the random search

  • subsample_proportion – proportion of training data used to compute errors

  • iterations – number of MRP interations used by the random search

Returns

best found value for gamma

run(iterations)¶

Runs SD-STMRP for the specified number of iterations.

Parameters

iterations – number of iterations used for the state value update function

Returns

interpolated grid pred_grid

set_gamma(gamma)¶

Sets gamma to the manually supplied value.

Parameters

gamma – user-supplied gamma value

set_tau(tau)¶

Sets tau to the manually supplied value.

Parameters

tau – user-supplied tau value

class MRPinterpolation.STMRP.STMRP(data, auto_timesteps)¶

Bases: object

Basic class implementing the basic spatio-temporal framework for SD-MRP and WP-MRP.

original_grid2D numpy array

the original grid supplied to be interpolated

pred_grid2D numpy array

interpolated version of original_grid

Gnetworkx directed graph

graph representation of pred_grid

reset():

Returns pred_grid and G to their original state

dim_check():

Checks the dimensions of supplied grid, transforms to 3D grid if necessary

set_timesteps():

Automatically creates a 3D grid from a time-stamped dictionary of 2D spatial grids

to_graph():

Converts original_grid to a graph representation

update_grid():

Updates pred_grid to reflect changes to G

get_pred_grid():

Returns pred_grid

dim_check(grid)¶

Checks the dimensions of the supplied grid, and transforms it into a 3D grid (at a single time step) if necessary (this retains non-temporal spatial MRP functionality).

Parameters

grid – grid to check dimensions of

Returns

suitable 3D grid

get_pred_grid()¶

Return pred_grid

reset()¶

Return prediction grid and graph representation to their original form

set_timesteps(data)¶

Checks the dimensions of the supplied grid, and transforms it into a 3D grid (at a single time step) if necessary (this retains non-temporal spatial MRP functionality).

Parameters

data – dictionary containing time stamps as keys and

2D spatial grids as values. Time stamps MUST be chronologically ordered, and in string format “YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS” :returns: spatio-temporal 3D grid

to_graph(grid, default_E=0)¶

Converts a grid to graph form.

Parameters

default_E – default expected value used for initialisation of the MRP

update_grid()¶

Update pred_grid to reflect changes to G

class MRPinterpolation.STMRP.WP_STMRP(grid, feature_grid, model, auto_timestamps=False)¶

Bases: MRPinterpolation.STMRP.STMRP

Class for WP-STMRP, extending STMRP

original_grid2D numpy array

the original grid supplied to be interpolated

pred_grid2D numpy array

interpolated version of original_grid

feature_grid3D numpy array

grid corresponding to original_grid, with feature vectors on the z-axis

Gnetworkx directed graph

graph representation of pred_grid

modelsklearn-based prediction model

user-supplied machine learning model used to predict weights

run():

Runs WP-MRP

train():

Train supplied prediction model on subsampled data or a training set

run(iterations)¶

Runs WP-STMRP for the specified number of iterations.

Parameters

iterations – number of iterations used for the state value update function

Returns

interpolated grid pred_grid

train(train_grid=None, train_features=None)¶

Trains WP-STMRP’s weight prediction model on either subsampled data from original_grid and feature_grid, or a user-supplied training grid with corresponding features.

Parameters

  • train_grid – optional user-specified training grid

  • train_features – optional user-specified training feature grid
